name: downfall
summary: There is nothing Joe wouldn't do for his wife. But as they try to save their marriage with a romantic getaway, things go from bad to worse, and from worse... to insanity...
info:
• 中文名: 坠落
  • 别名: 沉沦、下沉
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 恐怖 惊悚 独立
  • 发行日期: 2016年2月15日
  • 售价: ¥ 45
  • 官方网站: http://www.quiethavenhotel.co.uk/
